body:
Comment 2 by **RMiB.email**: 
Sorry, ewidth in go/src/cmd/6c/txt.c
schar	ewidth[NTYPE] =
{
	-1,		/*[TXXX]*/
	SZ_CHAR,	/*[TCHAR]*/
	SZ_CHAR,	/*[TUCHAR]*/
	SZ_SHORT,	/*[TSHORT]*/
	SZ_SHORT,	/*[TUSHORT]*/
	SZ_INT,		/*[TINT]*/
	SZ_INT,		/*[TUINT]*/
	SZ_LONG,	/*[TLONG]*/
	SZ_LONG,	/*[TULONG]*/
	SZ_VLONG,	/*[TVLONG]*/
	SZ_VLONG,	/*[TUVLONG]*/
	SZ_FLOAT,	/*[TFLOAT]*/
	SZ_DOUBLE,	/*[TDOUBLE]*/
	SZ_IND,		/*[TIND]*/
	0,		/*[TFUNC]*/
	-1,		/*[TARRAY]*/
	0,		/*[TVOID]*/
	-1,		/*[TSTRUCT]*/
	-1,		/*[TUNION]*/
	SZ_INT,		/*[TENUM]*/
};
